DataElement.preferredName: HIV-Related Encephalopathy Present Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Yes/No Indicator of whether HIV-related encephalopathy is present.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Relationship To Human Immunodeficiency Virus Encephalopathy Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._The virus isolated and recognized as the etiologic agent of AIDS. HIV-1 is classified as a lentivirus, a subtype of retroviruses._A functional and/or structural disorder of the brain caused by diseases (e.g. liver disease, kidney disease), medications, chemicals, and injuries.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Relationship To Human Immunodeficiency Virus Encephalopathy
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._The virus isolated and recognized as the etiologic agent of AIDS. HIV-1 is classified as a lentivirus, a subtype of retroviruses._A functional and/or structural disorder of the brain caused by diseases (e.g. liver disease, kidney disease), medications, chemicals, and injuries.

Concepts.definition: A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
The virus isolated and recognized as the etiologic agent of AIDS. HIV-1 is classified as a lentivirus, a subtype of retroviruses.
A functional and/or structural disorder of the brain caused by diseases (e.g. liver disease, kidney disease), medications, chemicals, and injuries.

Property.preferredDefinition: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
